DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study - determine effect 12 week HMB free acid gel , ATP , HMB free acid gel plus ATP supplementation train individual periodized training program skeletal muscle hypertrophy , body composition , strength , force , velocity , peak power load unloaded vertical jump . Additionally , study determine either supplementation protocol prevents typical decay see performance follow overreach cycle perform 9th 10th week study . Finally , study elucidate mechanism action supplementation protein breakdown analyze serum index muscle damage ( CK , LDH ) anabolic status ( Testosterone : Cortisol ratio ) well urinary indicator protein breakdown ( 3-methylhistidine ) . We hypothesize condition supplementation protocols augment skeletal muscle hypertrophy , strength , power HMB blunt increase serum index muscle damage , urinary index protein breakdown .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects HMB , ATP , HMB Plus ATP Muscle Mass , Strength , Power Resistance Trained Athletes
DOC.detailed_description: In randomize double blind study subject consume either placebo supplement , HMB supplement , ATP supplement , HMB plus ATP supplement 12 week . While consume supplement subject undergo extensive resistance training program design train major muscle group . An additional overreaching training cycle week 9 10 involve high-volume , hypertrophy style training program . Subject test consist follow : - Strength power week 0 , 1 , 4 , 8 , 9 , 10 , 12 - Range motion muscle soreness week 0 , 1 , 8 , 9 , 10 - Body composition muscle assessment week 0 , 1 , 4 , 8 , 9 , 10 , 12 - Body fat assessment week 0 , 4 , 8 , 12 - Blood biochemical measurement week 0 , 1 , 4 , 8 , 9 , 10 , 12 - Urinary analysis protein breakdown ( 3-methylhistidine ) 0 , 1 , 8 , 9 , 10 week
DOC.criteria: Subjects must meet inclusion criterion participate study . Have 3 year minimum free weight train experience Can squat minimum 1.5 time bodyweight Can bench press minimum equal bodyweight Can deadlift minimum 1.5 time bodyweight Are free musculoskeletal injury Have take creatine HMB supplement 6 week Are take amino acid supplement Are use anabolic catabolic hormone Are take medication may interfere study measurement Are user tobacco product All candidate meet one exclusion criterion enrol study . Do 3 year minimum free weight train experience Can squat minimum 1.5 time bodyweight Can bench press minimum equal bodyweight Can deadlift minimum 1.5 time bodyweight Are free musculoskeletal injury Have take creatine HMB supplement past 6 week Are currently take amino acid supplement Are use anabolic catabolic hormone Are take medication may interfere study measurement Use tobacco product
